name: part_004
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア4周年記念LIVE】平成初期アニソン祭り【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [7lJ5kdZGFgk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Rinbu -revolution-' by Shiranui Flare and Houshou Marine.
Performance of 'Go-Round' by Shiranui Flare and Shirakami Fubuki.

subtitles.original: ...いられないね
subtitles.english: ...can't stay as you are.

subtitles.original: 若い子みんなそうだと 思われるのは
subtitles.english:
I don't like it when people think
all young kids are like that.

subtitles.original: 不本意で どうしようもないじゃない
subtitles.english: It's so frustrating and there's nothing I can do.

subtitles.original: でもね
subtitles.english: But you know...

subtitles.original: 私たち友達のこと 何より大切にしてる
subtitles.english: We treasure our friends more than anything else.

subtitles.original: きっと大人よりも
subtitles.english: Even more than adults, I'm sure.

subtitles.original: 夢を見て 涙して 傷ついても
subtitles.english: Even if we dream, cry, and get hurt...

subtitles.original: 現実は がむしゃらに来るし
subtitles.english: Reality comes at us relentlessly.

subtitles.original: 自分の居場所 存在価値は 失くせない
subtitles.english: We can't lose our place or the value of our existence.

subtitles.original: 自分を守るために
subtitles.english: In order to protect ourselves.

subtitles.original: あのアドバルーン 戻れない
subtitles.english: That ad-balloon won't return...

subtitles.original: それぞれの 道を選ぶ時が来る前に
subtitles.english: ...before the time comes for us to choose our own paths.

subtitles.original: こんなにも こんなにも 大切な
subtitles.english: These precious memories...

subtitles.original: 思い出 解き放つよ
subtitles.english: ...so many of them, I will set them free.

subtitles.original: Take my revolution 生きて行こう
subtitles.english: Take my revolution, let's live on.

subtitles.original: 現実は がむしゃらに来るし
subtitles.english: Reality comes at us relentlessly.

subtitles.original: 自分の居場所 存在価値を 見つけたい
subtitles.english: I want to find my place and the value of my existence.

subtitles.original: 今日までの自分を
subtitles.english: Everything about myself up until today...

subtitles.original: 潔く 脱ぎ捨てる 裸になる
subtitles.english: ...I'll resolutely cast off and lay myself bare.

subtitles.original: 自由を舞う 薔薇のように
subtitles.english: Like a rose dancing in freedom.

subtitles.original: たとえ二人 離ればなれになっても
subtitles.english: Even if the two of us are torn apart...

subtitles.original: 私は世界を変える
subtitles.english: I will change the world.

subtitles.original:
Go-Round
作詞：浜口祐夢 作曲：Face 2 FAKE
subtitles.english:
Go-Round
Lyrics: Hamaguchi Megumi, Music: Face 2 FAKE

subtitles.original: 奇跡の風が 胸吹き抜ける
subtitles.english: A miraculous wind blows through my chest.

subtitles.original: ちょっぴり強くなれる気がして
subtitles.english: I feel like I can become a little stronger.

subtitles.original: 純情なMy感情が
subtitles.english: My innocent emotions...

subtitles.original: 騒ぎ出す
subtitles.english: ...begin to stir.

subtitles.original: 知らず知らずに 鍵をかけていた
subtitles.english: Without even realizing it, I had locked them away.

subtitles.original: Love Heart たちよ 今こそ
subtitles.english: Oh, Love Hearts, now is the time.

subtitles.original: 有象無象の剣を
subtitles.english: Those miscellaneous swords...

subtitles.original: 振り解き放て
subtitles.english: ...shake them off and set them free.

subtitles.original: きらめきをバックに詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Packing the sparkle into my bag.

subtitles.original: 君が笑う 楽園へ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go to the paradise where you smile.

subtitles.original: 不思議なパワー 二人で
subtitles.english: This mysterious power, with the two of us...

subtitles.original: 呼び覚ませ
subtitles.english: ...let's awaken it.

subtitles.original: 回れMerry-go-round めくるめくFuture
subtitles.english: Spin, Merry-go-round, a dazzling future.

subtitles.original: 負けないくらい 信じて
subtitles.english: Believe enough not to lose.

subtitles.original: 響け夢にGo-round 抱きしめ太陽
subtitles.english: Echo to the dreams, Go-round, embrace the sun.

subtitles.original: きっと虹になる 今まで
subtitles.english: It will surely become a rainbow, even now.

subtitles.original: 回れMerry-go-round 大事なMessage
subtitles.english: Spin, Merry-go-round, an important message.

subtitles.original: 忘れないで 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Don't forget it, right now.

subtitles.original: 君の胸にGo-round 今伝えたいんだ
subtitles.english: Into your heart, Go-round, I want to tell you now...

subtitles.original: 愛は無敵だと
subtitles.english: ...that love is invincible.

subtitles.original: ガラスの扉 激しく叩いて
subtitles.english: Banging hard on the glass door.

subtitles.original: 見つめたい自分を 映して
subtitles.english: Reflecting the self I want to look at.

subtitles.original: 迷わずに 次のステージへ
subtitles.english: Without hesitation, to the next stage...

subtitles.original: 舞い上がれ
subtitles.english: ...soar high!

subtitles.original: 不安なAdventure 信じて
subtitles.english: Believe in the uneasy adventure.

subtitles.original: 息を止めて 口づけをしたら
subtitles.english: If we hold our breath and share a kiss...

subtitles.original: 未来のEnergy あふれ出して
subtitles.english: The energy of the future will overflow...

subtitles.original: くるよ
subtitles.english: ...and come to us!
